bug.author: vdutor
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>System information</denchmark-h>
not applicable (regards documentation) <denchmark-h:h3>Describe the problem</denchmark-h>
The docstring of matrix_triangular_solve is not clear, see <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/matrix_triangular_solve>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/matrix_triangular_solve</denchmark-link> . There are formatting issues, but moreover, it is not immediately clear what the effect of is. It would be helpful to describe the effect using linear algebra notation. <denchmark-h:h3>Source code / logs</denchmark-h>
not applicable (regards documentation)

comments.comment:
What language would you suggest? Contributions are welcome :) - you'd want to change the string here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops.cc#L430>https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/linalg_ops.cc#L430</denchmark-link>
FYI <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rmlarsen>@rmlarsen</denchmark-link> in case he has some comments.
